summary: Core routing and navigation changes to make About the '/' route and place About first in nav appear implemented, and a persistent WhatsApp floating button was added. However, several strict-text requirements are not met (exact hero copy and exact prefilled WhatsApp message), and at least one booking CTA/external calendar link appears to remain (Impact page). The diff also includes unrelated/unrequested work (favicons/favicon loader) and edits to an explicitly immutable hook file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Place the provided hero introduction content at the top of the About page exactly as written (character-for-character).
missing_requirements.reason: The About hero line 3 uses a straight apostrophe ("let's") instead of the required curly apostrophe ("let’s") per the BuildRequest's exact text constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all booking/scheduling CTAs across the site and remove any remaining external calendar links.
missing_requirements.reason: Project file summary indicates the Impact page still contains a consultation CTA button linking to Google Calendar, which violates removal of booking/scheduling CTAs and external calendar links.

missing_requirements.requirement: WhatsApp deep link must use phone +923315166680 and the prefilled message must be exactly: "Hi Imran, I’d like to discuss analytics or BI consulting."
missing_requirements.reason: The WhatsApp utility uses a straight apostrophe in "I'd" instead of the required curly apostrophe "I’d" (exact-text constraint).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/dynamic favicon management (favicon loader + updated favicon link metadata).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request favicon changes or a favicon loader; this is unrelated scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified an explicitly immutable frontend hook file (useInternetIdentity.ts).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints explicitly say immutable paths must not be edited, yet the diff shows this file modified.
